title: AWESOME 2BR 1BA 2nd FL HW DW OWN DRIVEWAY BUS TO HVD 7/15
posting_body: PLEASE CALL 617-586-6222 WITH QUESTIONS OR TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING.
VIEWINGS CAN NOT BE SCHEDULED VIA EMAIL OR TEXT.
Sunny and spacious 2 bedroom apartment located on the second floor of a well-maintained two-family home near the Belmont/Cambridge line.
The unit features two good size bedrooms, a living room, a dining room, and a fully applianced, renovated eat-in kitchen.
There is an enclosed sunroom in the rear of the house.
There are hardwood floors, in excellent condition, throughout.
There is an abundance of closet space and tons of storage available in the walk-up attic.
A washer and dryer are provided for the tenant's convenience.
There is a nice backyard to enjoy.
Two off-street parking spaces are provided in your own separate driveway.
Heat is by gas and the tenant pays for all of their own utilities including water and sewer.
Ideally located adjacent to the Harvard Lawn section of Belmont.
Convenient to public transportation to Harvard Square.
Easy access to rt. 2, Storrow and Memorial Drives and the Mass Pike.
Minutes from the Cambridge reservoir and walking paths and the Fresh Pond Golf Course.
Sorry, absolutely no pets, and smoking is not permitted inside the home.
Per the landlord's request, applicants must have good credit and be well qualified without exception.
Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.
Photos of managed buildings may be representative only and not of the actual unit available.
